goal.ch: “The courses Accounting I, II focus on ways in which accounting principles are used in business operations.“
goal.en: “The courses Accounting I, II focus on ways in which accounting principles are used in business operations.“

outline.ch:
“Students can learn the following topics.
Part 1: ACCOUNTING in BUSINESS
Part 2: ACCOUNTING PROCEDURES
Part 3: ACCOUNTING for MERCHANDISING OPERATIONS
Part 4: INVENTORIES and COST of SALES
Part 5: ACCOUNTING for RECEIVABLES
Part 6: ACCOUNTING for LONG-TERM ASSETS
Part 7: CURRENT LIABILITIES
Part 8: LONG-TERM LIABILITIES
Part 9: ACCOUNTING for CORPORATIONS
Part 10: REPORTING the STATEMENT of CASH FLOWS
Part 11: TOPICS FOR FURTHER STUDY (optional)
Cash and Internal Controls
Financial Statement Analysis
Investments
Accounting Ethics
Part 12:Examination“
